data.title: 4 ways to travel via train, bus, and plane
data.meta_description: Find the travel options from Riola to Putzu Idu that best suit you.
data.text:
What companies run services between Riola, Valencia, Spain and Putzu Idu, Italy?

There is no direct connection from Riola to Putzu Idu. However, you can take the bus to Estació d'Autobusos de València, walk to Estació d'Autobusos, take the bus to Ferran El Catòlic, walk to Àngel Guimerà, take the line 5 subway to Aeroport, walk to Valencia (VLC) airport, fly to Cagliari (CAG), walk to Fermata di AEROPORTO ELMAS ARRIVI, take the bus to Fermata di ORISTANO STAZIONE ARST, then take the bus to S`Arena Scoada. Alternatively, you can take the bus to Estació d'Autobusos de València, walk to Estació d'Autobusos, take the bus to Ferran El Catòlic, walk to Àngel Guimerà, take the line 5 subway to Aeroport, walk to Valencia (VLC) airport, fly to Olbia (OLB), walk to Aeroporto, take the bus to C.so V. Veneto Diaz, walk to Olbia Terranova, take the train to Abbasanta, walk to Fermata di Abbasanta, then take the bus to Fermata di PUTZU IDU.
